meanings.definition: A secondary or subordinate theme within a larger theme.
meanings.sent1: The book had many subthemes that added depth to the main story.
meanings.sent2: The subthemes of the painting highlighted different aspects of nature.
meanings.sent3: The subthemes at the party were all about different types of desserts.
meanings.sent4: Her speech had so many subthemes, it was like a bouquet of flowers.
meanings.sent5: The subthemes in the movie made it more interesting and engaging.

meanings.definition: A specific topic or idea that is a subset of a broader theme.
meanings.sent1: The subthemes of the conference covered various aspects of technology.
meanings.sent2: Each chapter in the book explores different subthemes of friendship.
meanings.sent3: The subthemes in the game were all about different types of magical creatures.
meanings.sent4: Her essay was a tapestry of subthemes woven together seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The subthemes in the presentation helped clarify the main message.
